Key Arguments: The text emphasizes the importance of maintaining peace and calmness amid life's chaos.
It advises on being true to oneself and maintaining good relationships with others.
The text encourages self-acceptance and warns against comparing oneself to others.
It highlights the importance of being cautious in business but also recognizing the virtue in others.
The text suggests nurturing inner strength and being gentle with oneself.
Notable Quotes: Go placidly amid the noise and the haste, and remember what peace there may be in silence.
Speak your truth quietly and clearly; and listen to others, even to the dull and the ignorant, they too have their story.
You are a child of the universe, no less than the trees and the stars; you have a right to be here.
